channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Philly burbs police stunned by arrest of apparent grave robbery carrying sack with skulls, bones, mummified remains
item.description: "Given the enormity of what we are looking at and the sheer, utter lack of reasonable explanation, it’s difficult to say ... exactly what took place."
